bonuses.desc: Max HP increased by 1000.
Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

artis.name: Adventurer's Flower
artis.desc: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

artis.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
artis.desc: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

artis.name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
artis.desc: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

artis.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
artis.desc: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

artis.name: Adventurer's Bandana
artis.desc: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

bonuses.desc: DEF increased by 100.
Picking up Mora restores 300 HP.

artis.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
artis.desc: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

artis.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
artis.desc: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

artis.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
artis.desc: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

artis.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
artis.desc: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

artis.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
artis.desc: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

bonuses.desc: Increases incoming healing by 20%.
Using Elemental Burst restores 20% HP.

artis.name: Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus
artis.desc: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.

artis.name: Traveling Doctor's Owl Feather
artis.desc: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.

artis.name: Traveling Doctor's Pocket Watch
artis.desc: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.

artis.name: Traveling Doctor's Medicine Pot
artis.desc: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.

artis.name: Traveling Doctor's Handkerchief
artis.desc: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.

bonuses.desc: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

artis.name: Heart of Comradeship
artis.desc: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

artis.name: Feather of Homecoming
artis.desc: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

artis.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
artis.desc: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

artis.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
artis.desc: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

artis.name: Crown of Parting
artis.desc: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

bonuses.desc: All Elemental RES increased by 20%.
Incoming elemental DMG increases corresponding Elemental RES by 30% for 10s. Can only occur once every 10s.

artis.name: Tiny Miracle's Flower
artis.desc: A flower that grew from a rock, breaking through the stone as it strove to reach the light.

artis.name: Tiny Miracle's Feather
artis.desc: A feather from a bird of prey that flies almost too fast for the human eye to detect.

artis.name: Tiny Miracle's Hourglass
artis.desc: Just an ordinary, everyday hourglass. Turn it upside down and sure enough, the dry sand starts trickling down like water.

artis.name: Tiny Miracle's Goblet
artis.desc: A cup commonly used for fortune-telling. It can also hold water, of course.

artis.name: Tiny Miracle's Earrings
artis.desc: A cheap accessory that is actually made from ancient meteoric ore.

bonuses.desc: CRIT Rate +12%
When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

artis.name: Berserker's Rose
artis.desc: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

artis.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
artis.desc: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

artis.name: Berserker's Timepiece
artis.desc: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

artis.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
artis.desc: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

artis.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
artis.desc: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

bonuses.desc: Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.
Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

artis.name: Instructor's Brooch
artis.desc: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

artis.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
artis.desc: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

artis.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
artis.desc: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

artis.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
artis.desc: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

artis.name: Instructor's Cap
artis.desc: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

bonuses.desc: Energy Recharge +20%
Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

artis.name: Exile's Flower
artis.desc: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

artis.name: Exile's Feather
artis.desc: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

artis.name: Exile's Pocket Watch
artis.desc: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.

artis.name: Exile's Goblet
artis.desc: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

artis.name: Exile's Circlet
artis.desc: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

bonuses.desc: DEF +30%
For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

artis.name: Guardian's Flower
artis.desc: An iris that was cherished by the guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the guardian loved.

artis.name: Guardian's Sigil
artis.desc: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone’s yearning to defend others like a shield.

artis.name: Guardian's Clock
artis.desc: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

artis.name: Guardian's Vessel
artis.desc: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

artis.name: Guardian's Band
artis.desc: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

bonuses.desc: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

artis.name: Medal of the Brave
artis.desc: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

artis.name: Prospect of the Brave
artis.desc: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

artis.name: Fortitude of the Brave
artis.desc: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

artis.name: Outset of the Brave
artis.desc: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

artis.name: Crown of the Brave
artis.desc: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

bonuses.desc: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

artis.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
artis.desc: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

artis.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
artis.desc: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

artis.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
artis.desc: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

artis.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
artis.desc: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

artis.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
artis.desc: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

bonuses.desc: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 20%.
Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

artis.name: Gambler's Brooch
artis.desc: A big, luxurious flower that can hide a loaded dice.

artis.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
artis.desc: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

artis.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
artis.desc: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

artis.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
artis.desc: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

artis.name: Gambler's Earrings
artis.desc: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

bonuses.desc: Energy Recharge +20%
Gaining Elemental Particles or Orbs gives 3 Energy to all party members who have a bow or a catalyst equipped. Can only occur once every 3s.

artis.name: Scholar's Bookmark
artis.desc: A dried flower used as a bookmark. It has absorbed the scent from the pages.

artis.name: Scholar's Quill Pen
artis.desc: A bird's feather that serves as a quill pen. The tip has long been stained black.

artis.name: Scholar's Clock
artis.desc: A small desktop clock, whose former owner was a scholar sat in a windowless room buried in books. This was probably the only reference they had to the time of day.

artis.name: Scholar's Ink Cup
artis.desc: Originally designed to hold drinking water, this cup was stained black after a scholar used it to wash their paint brushes.

artis.name: Scholar's Lens
artis.desc: This corrective lens helped restore the vision of one whose eyes were damaged from intensive studying.

bonuses.desc: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.

artis.name: Tiara of Flame
artis.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

bonuses.desc: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.

artis.name: Tiara of Torrents
artis.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

bonuses.desc: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.

artis.name: Tiara of Thunder
artis.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened to the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

bonuses.desc: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.

artis.name: Tiara of Frost
artis.desc: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of the icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

bonuses.desc: Cryo DMG Bonus +15%
When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

artis.name: Snowswept Memory
artis.desc: A long-extinct flower, covered in beads of frost, that once grew on the glaciers. There was a time when even the proudest and most arrogant warriors bowed before it.

artis.name: Icebreaker's Resolve
artis.desc: A feather that exudes a chilly aura. One can almost feel the turbulent winds that brought it here, wailing over snow-covered plains and between frosty peaks.

artis.name: Frozen Homeland's Demise
artis.desc: A timepiece from a nation of old that waited for their warriors' return. What flows inside is not sand, but bits of ice that never melt.

artis.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
artis.desc: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

artis.name: Broken Rime's Echo
artis.desc: The crown of an ancient hero who dreamt of conquering the cold. It is proof of its former master's bravery in facing the bone-chilling cold of winter.

bonuses.desc: Electro RES increased by 40%.
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Electro by 35%.

artis.name: Thundersoother's Heart
artis.desc: A flower that blooms even amidst ferocious thunder and lightning. To this day, it still grants courage to travelers in thunderstorms.

artis.name: Thundersoother's Plume
artis.desc: The feather of a predatory bird that soars through lightning storms. It was said to have been adopted as an insignia by the legendary hero who pacified thunder and lightning.

artis.name: Hour of Soothing Thunder
artis.desc: A timepiece kept by the hero who conquered thunder and lightning. The tiny shards of Electro crystal within flow back and forth with the passing of time.

artis.name: Thundersoother's Goblet
artis.desc: The wine goblet from which the Thundersoother, who defeated the Beast of Thunder, once drank violet lightning.

artis.name: Thundersoother's Diadem
artis.desc: The crown given to the Thundersoother for defeating the Beast of Thunder that had been wreaking havoc upon the land.

bonuses.desc: Pyro RES increased by 40%.
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

artis.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
artis.desc: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

artis.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
artis.desc: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

artis.name: Lavawalker's Torment
artis.desc: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

artis.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
artis.desc: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

artis.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
artis.desc: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

bonuses.desc: Character Healing Effectiveness +15%
Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

artis.name: Maiden's Distant Love
artis.desc: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

artis.name: Maiden's Heart-stricken Infatuation
artis.desc: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

artis.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
artis.desc: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot not be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

artis.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
artis.desc: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

artis.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
artis.desc: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

bonuses.desc: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

artis.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
artis.desc: No-one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

artis.name: Gladiator's Destiny
artis.desc: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

artis.name: Gladiator's Longing
artis.desc: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

artis.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
artis.desc: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

artis.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
artis.desc: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

bonuses.desc: Anemo DMG Bonus +15%
Increases Swirl DMG by 60%. Decreases opponent's Elemental RES to the element infused in the Swirl by 40% for 10s.

artis.name: In Remembrance of Viridescent Fields
artis.desc: A wild flower that was once a ubiquitous sight in its homeland. It was picked by a hunter who wore it on their chest.

artis.name: Viridescent Arrow Feather
artis.desc: The fletching of an arrow that once pierced right through its prey, but somehow still remains spotless.

artis.name: Viridescent Venerer's Determination
artis.desc: A wondrous instrument that a hunter once wore. It forever points towards their prey.

artis.name: Viridescent Venerer's Vessel
artis.desc: A water pouch used by the Viridescent Venerer. Its capacity is much greater than one would expect.

artis.name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
artis.desc: A proud crown that once belonged to the Viridescent Venerer. It is as lush and green as the breezes of the wild.

bonuses.desc: Increases Elemental Mastery by 80.
Increases Charged Attack DMG by 35% if the character uses a Catalyst or a Bow.

artis.name: Troupe's Dawnlight
artis.desc: A small flower-shaped insignia. If you listen carefully, you can almost hear a flute playing and voices singing.

artis.name: Bard's Arrow Feather
artis.desc: An azure arrow fletching that has neither faded nor splintered with the passage of time. The sound of running water seems to linger around it.

artis.name: Concert's Final Hour
artis.desc: An hourglass used to keep time during a band performance. It once made a crisp sound, but their performance has since ended.

artis.name: Wanderer's String-Kettle
artis.desc: An ancient, strangely-shaped canteen. The interior is fitted with harp strings, which play a wondrous tune as the water flows out.

artis.name: Conductor's Top Hat
artis.desc: A top hat that has managed to retain its radiance despite braving the elements for time untold. An ancient tune still resonates within.

bonuses.desc: Electro DMG Bonus +15%
Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.

artis.name: Thunderbird's Mercy
artis.desc: A lightning-infused flower, somehow spared the fate of being trodden underfoot or reduced to ash by the furious purple fire, making it the sole survivor on the day of disaster.

artis.name: Survivor of Catastrophe
artis.desc: A lightning-charged feather that still flickers with the wrath of the Thunderbird's cruel retribution.

artis.name: Hourglass of Thunder
artis.desc: The hourglass used to foretell the coming of the Thunderbird by the tribe that worshiped it. It has fallen into eternal silence now that the tribe is no more.

artis.name: Omen of Thunderstorm
artis.desc: A ceremonial cup that holds the blood of the innocent. It is brimming with the thundering fury of the prayers that echo within.

artis.name: Thunder Summoner's Crown
artis.desc: A crown once worn by an ancient shaman who worshiped the Thunderbird. The capricious beast remained unmoved by the shaman's devotion.

bonuses.desc: Pyro DMG Bonus +15%
Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

artis.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
artis.desc: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

artis.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
artis.desc: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

artis.name: Witch's End Time
artis.desc: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

artis.name: Witch's Heart Flames
artis.desc: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

artis.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
artis.desc: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all of the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

bonuses.desc: Elemental Burst DMG +20%
Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

artis.name: Royal Flora
artis.desc: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

artis.name: Royal Plume
artis.desc: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

artis.name: Royal Pocket Watch
artis.desc: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

artis.name: Royal Silver Urn
artis.desc: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

artis.name: Royal Masque
artis.desc: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

bonuses.desc: Physical DMG +25%
After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

artis.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
artis.desc: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

artis.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
artis.desc: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

artis.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
artis.desc: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

artis.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
artis.desc: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

artis.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
artis.desc: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

bonuses.desc: Gain a 15% Geo DMG Bonus.

Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

artis.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
artis.desc: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

artis.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
artis.desc: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

artis.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
artis.desc: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. Its lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

artis.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
artis.desc: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

artis.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
artis.desc: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

bonuses.desc: Increases Shield Strength by 35%.
While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

artis.name: Summer Night's Bloom
artis.desc: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

artis.name: Summer Night's Finale
artis.desc: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

artis.name: Summer Night's Moment
artis.desc: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

artis.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
artis.desc: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

artis.name: Summer Night's Mask
artis.desc: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

bonuses.desc: Hydro DMG Bonus +15%
After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

artis.name: Gilded Corsage
artis.desc: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

artis.name: Gust of Nostalgia
artis.desc: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

artis.name: Copper Compass
artis.desc: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

artis.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
artis.desc: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

artis.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
artis.desc: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.
